sections.servicesDescription: From routine maintenance to complex repairs, we've got you covered with professional service you can trust.
sections.customersDescription: Don't just take our word for it - hear from our satisfied customers.
sections.readyDescription: Book your appointment today and experience the Joe Service difference. Quality work, honest prices, and service you can trust.

footer.description: Your trusted partner for all automotive needs. Quality service, honest prices, and expert mechanics since 1999.

about.title: About
about.description: For over 25 years, we've been the trusted name in automotive repair. Our commitment to quality, honesty, and customer satisfaction has made us the go-to choice for drivers across the region.
about.missionQuote: To provide every customer with exceptional automotive service through expert craftsmanship, transparent communication, and unwavering integrity. We treat every vehicle as if it were our own, ensuring you drive away with confidence and peace of mind.

values.integrityDesc: We believe in honest assessments and fair pricing. No hidden fees, no unnecessary repairs.
values.excellenceDesc: We use only quality parts and employ the most skilled technicians in the industry.
values.efficiencyDesc: We respect your time with accurate estimates and timely service completion.
values.communityDesc: We're not just a business, we're your neighbors committed to keeping you safe on the road.

about.journeyDescription: From a small garage to a community institution, here's how we got here.

1999.title: Foundation
1999.description: Joe Martinez opens his first garage with a vision of honest, quality service.

2005.title: Expansion
2005.description: Moved to a larger facility with state-of-the-art equipment.

2012.title: ASE Certification
2012.description: Entire team achieves ASE Master Certification.

2018.title: Digital Transformation
2018.description: Launched online booking and customer portal.

2024.title: Community Leader
2024.description: Recognized as the most trusted auto shop in the region.

about.teamDescription: Our skilled technicians bring decades of combined experience to every job.

services.title: Our
services.description: From routine maintenance to complex repairs, our certified technicians deliver quality service you can trust.
services.noServicesFound: No services found in this category.
services.customQuoteDesc: Have a specific issue or need a service not listed? Contact us for a personalized assessment and quote.

gallery.title: Our
gallery.description: Take a look at our work, our facility, and the team that makes it all happen.
gallery.noImagesFound: No images found in this category.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Have a question or need to schedule a service? We're here to help.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject

auth.resetInstructions: Enter your email to receive reset instructions

booking.title: Book an
booking.description: Complete the steps below to schedule your service

chat.title: Joe Service Support
chat.subtitle: We typically reply within minutes
chat.greeting: Hi! üëã How can I help you today?

responses.booking: I'd be happy to help you book a service! You can use our online booking system by clicking 'Book Now' in the menu, or I can connect you with our team.
responses.status: To check your appointment status, please visit your customer portal or provide your job code and I'll look it up for you.
responses.quote: For an accurate quote, could you tell me what service you need? We offer oil changes, brake service, diagnostics, and more.
responses.human: I'll connect you with a team member right away. Please hold while I transfer you...

serviceCards.oilChangeDesc: Complete oil change with premium synthetic oil and new filter. Includes fluid top-off and multi-point inspection.
serviceCards.engineDiagnosticsDesc: Comprehensive computer diagnostics to identify engine issues, check error codes, and pinpoint problems accurately.
serviceCards.brakeServiceDesc: Complete brake inspection, pad replacement, rotor resurfacing or replacement, and brake fluid flush.
serviceCards.engineRepairDesc: From minor repairs to complete engine overhauls. Our expert mechanics handle all engine-related issues.
serviceCards.tireServicesDesc: Tire rotation, balancing, alignment, repair, and replacement. We work with all major tire brands.
serviceCards.customWorkDesc: Performance upgrades, custom modifications, and specialty work. Tell us your vision, we make it happen.

reminders.title: Service Reminders
reminders.subtitle: Automated maintenance reminders for your customers
reminders.autoRemindersDesc: Automatically create reminders based on service history
